name: Worldvein Resonance
description:
Concentrate energy into the Heart of Azeroth, immediately causing 2 Lifeblood Shards to erupt from the nearby ground for 12 sec, and incease the primary stat gained from Lifeblood Shards by 300% for 18 sec.

Lifeblood Shard
Grants you and any other ally using Worldvein Resonance 3 primary stat while within 8 yds of the Lifeblood Shard. You can benefit from a maximum of 4 Lifeblood Shards at a time.
